welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oji, Japan! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes, rich culture, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Oji has to offer during your visit. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kansai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kansai International Airport, mainly used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but users must register with a valid email address to access it.
